title: ISic030142. ISic030142
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]ΤΑΙΝ[---]
[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]
[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]-
κ̣ας Θράσυς Ἐμ-
5μενίδας Δορι-
στόνφο̄ν ͱαπ-
άντο̄ν ἐστὶ ͱυ-
πέρτατος ἀκίδ-
ον

Apparatus criticus

Text after Cassio 1994 with minor emendation of Cordano 2020

English translation

Italian translation

[...] Thrasys Emmenidas di tutti i coraggiosi con la lancia è il migliore degli arcieri (trans. Cordano)

commentary

This document is physically and archaeologically distinct from the tesserae with which it was originally published, from a different context in the sanctuary of Athena at the archaeological site of Kamarina. The revised reading of Cassio, followed by Cordano makes it a dedication by Thrasys for his success with the bow.

bibliography

    Cordano 1992 6 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002437 42.0846 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 Cassio 1994 5-20 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002762 Cordano 2020 263-266 fig.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002276
    52.0920 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 54.0892 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
